name: Hydrating Face Serum
description: Deeply hydrating serum with hyaluronic acid and vitamin B5 for plump, moisturized skin.

reviews.comment: Amazing hydration! My skin feels so plump.
Good but a bit sticky. Still works great!

name: Vitamin C Brightening Serum
description: Potent vitamin C serum that brightens skin tone and reduces dark spots.

reviews.comment: Amazing results! My skin is so much brighter.
Great product, slight tingling but effective.

name: Gentle Face Wash
description: Sulfate-free gentle cleanser that removes impurities without stripping skin.

reviews.comment: Gentle and effective. Perfect for sensitive skin.
Love this cleanser! Doesn't dry out my skin.

name: Face Moisturizer
description: Lightweight, non-greasy moisturizer that provides 24-hour hydration.

reviews.comment: Perfect texture and amazing hydration!
Great moisturizer, absorbs quickly.

name: Hair Serum
description: Argan oil-based serum that tames frizz and adds shine to all hair types.

reviews.comment: Amazing! My hair is so smooth and shiny now.
Great serum, reduces frizz effectively.

name: Hair Shampoo
description: Sulfate-free shampoo that cleanses gently while maintaining natural oils.

reviews.comment: Good shampoo, leaves hair soft and clean.
Gentle on scalp, no irritation.

name: Matte Lipstick
description: Long-lasting matte lipstick with intense color payoff and comfortable wear.

reviews.comment: Perfect matte finish! Stays on for hours.
Great color, slightly drying but beautiful finish.

name: Velvet Lipstick
description: Creamy velvet lipstick with rich pigmentation and smooth application.

reviews.comment: So creamy and pigmented! Love the texture.
Beautiful color, applies smoothly.

name: Natural Eyelashes
description: Handcrafted natural-looking false eyelashes for dramatic volume.

reviews.comment: Look very natural and easy to apply.
Good quality lashes, comfortable to wear.

name: BB Cream
description: All-in-one BB cream that provides coverage, hydration, and sun protection.

reviews.comment: Great coverage and feels lightweight on skin.
Perfect for everyday wear! Natural finish.

name: Blush
description: Silky smooth blush with buildable color for a natural flush.

reviews.comment: Beautiful color and blends perfectly!
Great pigmentation, lasts all day.

name: Eyeliner
description: Waterproof liquid eyeliner with precise tip for perfect wings.

reviews.comment: Perfect for creating sharp wings! Very precise.
Great staying power, doesn't smudge.

name: Perfume
description: Elegant floral fragrance with notes of jasmine, rose, and vanilla.

reviews.comment: Absolutely divine! Long-lasting and elegant.
Beautiful scent, perfect for special occasions.

name: Cologne
description: Fresh and masculine cologne with citrus and woody undertones.

reviews.comment: Fresh and clean scent, perfect for daily wear.
Love this fragrance! Gets many compliments.

name: Retinol Night Cream
description: Advanced anti-aging night cream with encapsulated retinol for gentle exfoliation.

reviews.comment: Amazing results! My skin texture has improved so much.
Great product, but start slow to avoid irritation.

name: Hair Mask
description: Intensive hair mask with keratin and argan oil for deep repair and shine.

reviews.comment: My hair feels so soft and healthy after using this!
Great deep conditioning treatment, reduces frizz.
